name: ThreeDayRule's30-DayDatingChallenge
0:
”Alexa, ask Three Day Rule for today's tip.”
”Alexa, open Three Day Rule.”
”Alexa, ask Three Day Rule what's today's tip?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three day rule
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Three Day Rule's 30-Day Dating Challenge is from the leading in-person personalized matchmaking company with a team of world-class matchmakers and dating experts. We want to prep you for dating by providing you a tip each day. We will help you gain insight and skills, making you more confident in dating over the course of 30 days!

- Ask Alexa for exclusive tips from Three Day Rule’s professional matchmaking team. Learn tips, tricks, and advice.

- Find out your daily tip by simply saying “Alexa, ask Three Day Rule for today’s tip.” Alexa will respond with the tip, stat, tool, or task for the day.

- An email address is required during installation for personalization and updates - we will not use your email for any other reason.

- For more information on the skill, contact us via support@threedayrule.com, or the comments section!

- Three Day Rule 30-Day Dating Challenge is an Alexa skill developed by Three Day Rule.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
